tests.description: Checking various properties of the array defined with expression "var array = []"

Checking various properteis and contents of the array defined with "var array = [1,2,3,4,5]"
Checking various properteis and content of the array defined with "var array = [,,,1,2]"
Checking various properteis and contents of the array defined with "var array = [4,5,,,,]"
Checking various properteis and contents of the array defined with "var array = [,,3,,,]"
Checking various properteis and contents of the array defined with "var array = [1,2,,4,5]"
Checking various properteis and contents of the arrya defined with "var array = [[1,2], [3], []]"
